name: Concentration
description: Proficiencies that help with maintaining concentration even in the face of distractions.
You are capable of holding the same thing in mind even when sitting in an uncomfortable position or after skipping a meal.
//: Just prof_concentration_basic from MoM or Aftershock . This is here so espers don't fail their own powers. Same goes for the ones below

description: You can maintain your concentration even if outside in winter without a coat or in the middle of a fight.
You can maintain your concentration even when suffering crippling injuries or while on mind-altering substances.
